A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I love the movie for what it give us and for what the future may hold in the Star wars universe now. The twists to the notions we thought would happen and does not\, was great. If they are going to answer all our questions about Rey's parents and how Snoke came about get answered thru other venues; will be greatly appreciated. If you really like Star Wars\, then go beyond the movies. Not everything has be Star Wars movies to be considered Star Wars. 

If you keep your mind open to how we can get the answers we want\, then look forward to the books\, games\, tv shows. That is a real Start Wars world in my opinion.

Overall\, this movie gave me the feeling I had the when I was 7 years old back in '78. Giddy. I am going to see a few more times and I look forward to EP IX.
